summary: In this chapter, Jack experiences profound internal conflict while trapped in a looping hallway that symbolizes his fears and doubts. As he struggles against the confines of the building, he encounters Evie, who challenges his understanding of escape and urges him to confront his true fears instead. Their exchange reveals Jack's anger and feelings of betrayal, but it also ignites a flicker of hope within him. Evie insists that to break free from the cycle of despair, Jack must embrace truth and fight against the darkness that binds him. He ultimately embraces a new perspective, allowing the light to guide him as he steps through the threshold of the ominous door, marking the beginning of his evolution within a story that can change.
